Hello Group,
=A0
I am writing to inform you that me home phone line is down=
 outside.=A0 It just dropped off suddenly this afternoon.=A0 That also mean=
s my DSL is down so I will not have access to email messages. ATT said they=
 my not be out until Sunday.=A0 WTF.
=A0
I will try to keep up to date on F=
ACEBOOK if possible?
=A0
Those of you that know me can reach me on my cell =
phone.=A0 
=A0
Ursula.
